content: As you follow the main story, you'll also encounter a number of NPCs that have side quests to complete. Doing so will reward you with unique items, special Spirits, and even reveal hidden areas in chapters.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Myth_Wukong_Guide.md', within the main section titled 'Black Myth: Wukong Wiki Sections', specifically from the subsection 'Side Quests'.
The content is as follows:
As you follow the main story, you'll also encounter a number of NPCs that have side quests to complete. Doing so will reward you with unique items, special Spirits, and even reveal hidden areas in chapters.
